game_description: Do you want to play party games with your friends or meet someone new? All is just one button press away with Mash Me Up. One button, multiple games. Will it be Air Hockey, Pier Pong, Flingball, or… Get ready for a surprise! Press, Play, Enjoy and Go Again! Join our discord: https://discord.gg/zQKKUseNt3
review_1: This game is so good, it has good games in it, my personal favourite is the spin the wheel, but it's a great way of communicating with people
review_2: Imagine you invite a friend over to hang out in your basement to play foosball with a slice of pizza in hand. This game is that exact same vibe. You can't play it without smiling. Every interaction here makes sense, like being able to grab your opponents air hockey mallet to grab a couple cheap points, while both of you can't stop laughing. I just can't understand why everyone isn't already playing this. Visuals are simple, yet outstanding right off the bat, the ambience is amazing.
review_3: Thanks to this a app I found a cool kid from a different country he’s very very funny
review_4: Finally found a game that I’ll play for the rest of the time that I have my quest
review_5: This game is so awesome I love it I could spend all night on it
